argSrc: No human being or human committee should again be given the permission to rule over 'life or death'.
argTrg: Courts are also subject to human error.

argSrc: No human being or human committee should again be given the permission to rule over 'life or death'.
argTrg: That's why Germany should not introduce capital punishment!

argTrg: Every human, even those who have committed a despicable crime, can bring themselves to regret and change their opinion.
